narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Lovable Family Home Care LLC is a Day Training  Developmentally Disabled Services provider based in Pembroke Pines, FL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $84.1M in Medicaid payments across 2.5M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $84.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
